ValidationRule.description: Prevent Revenue Date Change on Start and End date when Opportunity Stage is Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), ISCHANGED(Contract_Start_Date__c), ISCHANGED(Contract_End_Date__c), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the revenue start and end date of products when the opportunity has been closed-won
